message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. I'm willing to make a deal, but I'm trying to stay within a budget.
I understand you're on a budget, Bob. I can appreciate that. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $140 for the product. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy it.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. I'm trying to be reasonable, but I really want to get the best deal possible.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I can see you're really interested in the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer it to you for $135. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll be happy with the deal.
I appreciate the compromise, but I'm still trying to get the best deal possible. I'm willing to meet you halfway on the compromise, so I'll offer $132.50. Can we meet in the middle again?

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm glad we're getting close to a deal. I'll meet you halfway on the compromise again, so I'll offer it to you for $134. It's a fair price, and I think you'll be happy with it.

I appreciate the willingness to compromise, but I'm still trying to get as close to my budget as possible. I'll offer $132. I'm really interested in the product, and I'm willing to make a final offer. Can we meet at this price?

I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one last compromise. I'll offer it to you for $133. It's the best I can do, and I think it's a fair price for this amazing product.
